description: Complete system overview documenting the MEV protection architecture, key components, and their interactions
Detailed documentation of MEV attack detection algorithms including sandwich attacks, frontrunning, backrunning detection, and ML-based threat detection implementations
Comprehensive documentation of data flows between MEV detection engine, order flow control, and transaction protection components including builder/relay interactions
Detailed documentation of protection strategy selection algorithms, risk scoring systems, and protection level implementation logic
Documentation of builder reputation scoring models, MEV bot classification systems, and relay performance tracking mechanisms
